_doc: Reusable Time Series line panel. Shows a smooth line chart with Y-axis on the right.
_usage: Copy this panel into any dashboard. Replace the 'query' field with your Flux query. Query must return: _time (timestamp), _value (numeric), _field (series label). Update 'unit', 'min', 'max', 'axisLabel', and 'fixedColor' as needed.
title: Time Series Line
